item.title: Financial Matters
item.description: Disclaimer I am simply an enthusiastic lay person who happens to know some math, a fair bit of personal finance, and likes reading on the topic. Please consult a professional who is qualified for specific advice related to your financial situation. This means I don’t want to answer YOUR specific questions and I don’t want to get into the weeds. I prefer to teach people how to think about fishing, NOT even how to fish.
